text.p: Superior Consultant Holdings Corp and Trusted Information Systems led the pack of initial public offerings on Wall Street on Thursday.

Health care consulting firm Superior Consultant shares jumped more than thirty percent, up 4-7/8 to 20-7/8 from their IPO price of $16. The shares priced at $16, above their estimated pricing range of $13 to $15.
Trusted Information Systems Inc shares surged almost 28 percent, rising 3-5/8 to 16-5/8 from their $13 a share IPO price.
